author: alexdma
msg: - Removed ununsed Import-Package instructions in KReS POMs
- Removed redundant Export-Package instructions in KReS POMs (most bundles now only export their own packages)
- Set _nouses to true in KReS POMs (won't run on Equinox otherwise)
- Cleaned up spurious references to erroneously named package "eu.iksproject.kres.shered"

author: jukka
msg: Add the 1.5.0 release and upgrade copyright year to 2011
